bullets: Designed and deployed a computer vision model for defect detection in manufacturing, achieving 99.2% accuracy and reducing manual inspection costs by 30%
Optimized inference latency of a ResNet-50 based model by 40% using TensorRT and quantization techniques
Built automated retraining pipelines using Airflow and MLflow to handle data drift, ensuring consistent model performance in production
Developed ETL pipelines processing 2TB of daily log data using PySpark on AWS EMR
Collaborated with data scientists to productize prototype models, converting Jupyter notebooks into modular Python packages
Implemented data quality checks that reduced downstream reporting errors by 25%

projects.title: Semantic Search Engine
projects.description: Built a semantic search backend for a document repository. Fine-tuned a BERT model to improve search relevance by 20% over keyword matching.
bullets: Fine-tuned BERT model improving search relevance by 20% over keyword matching

projects.title: Real-time Crypto Predictor
projects.description: Streaming pipeline consuming real-time trade data to predict short-term price movements using LSTM networks.
bullets: Built streaming pipeline with LSTM for real-time cryptocurrency price prediction
